name: WizArt Studios
motto:
Be the design solution for every need.
 Empower artists to follow their dreams.
hook: Build your magical idea with the help of our skilled digital artists, marketing specialists and web developers. Everything in one place, all you need to do is say the magic words.
team_description: The team is composed of young, talented and hardworking apprentices. Each of us appeared out of thin air with the sole idea to be pro-active, energetic and task-driven towards achieving the upmost value for the customer. Artists, developers, marketing agents, sorcerers, mages, dwarfs and other magical beasts line up in our headquarters ready to work towards your enlightening ideas. Working with us will ensure that you will align all the ideas flowing through your head and choose the right path for your upcoming product/service. A few magic words and... POOF. Voil√†, there it is!
skills_description: Everyday we strive to add new skills to our carefully assembled set of capabilities. Below is a list of some of them. The special wizardry can only be discussed in a private call with the main mages.
contact_us_heading: We would love to hear more from you
contact_us_description: Feel free to reach out to us at anytime and schedule a meeting to talk about the future of your business.

theTeam.name: Turtle
theTeam.short_description: Doing art and consuming potions all the time
theTeam.description: The coffee+cigarette guy that makes art which is somewhat decent, also I love cats.

theTeam.name: Gabriela
theTeam.short_description: The canvas moves under her hand, not the other way around
theTeam.description: Hi I'm Gabriela! I've been artist since I can remember. I like to experiment with different type of art styles and mediums. I'm a cat lover and owner and I like to watch a lot of anime.

theTeam.name: Kriko
theTeam.short_description: A mag that kinda loves gadgets and magic powders. Be cautious around him
theTeam.role: Full Stack Web developer, Project Manager, Dev Team Lead
theTeam.description: I am the coder of the group. I always strive to expand my field of knowledge further and accept new endevours in the world of programming. My joints are fat like my commits. Main focus is on Javascript stack and soon more WEB3 solution as well. Sleep schedule is ruined since 1998.
theTeam.skills: HTML; CSS; Javascript and JS Frameworks(React, Angular); JQuery; NodeJS; Typescript; Redux/Flux; Knowledge of AWS Services; ElasticSearch Stack; Databases - PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, Sequilize, Firebase; REST API

theTeam.name: Amoros

theTeam.description: Cuz my name is too long so i need to reffer to dead Star Wars characters, 21, but the beard makes me 50. Call me Grandalf.

theTeam.name: Wizard
